data.name: Steel Tower Swordmaster
data.detailed_description:
You are chosen as the Sword Pilgrim. You are tasked with The Trial. You must find the Swordmaster at the top of Steel Tower. Kill everyone in your path.

Steel Tower Swordmaster is a combat-focused sword-fighting RPG. Immersed in a world of ruin and decay, discover stories of those who fight for power or struggle for survival across the towers.

Every fight requires skilled manoeuvring as you attack, dodge, hide, grapple and throw foes off bridges. Your decisions have an impact – play with empathy or malice. Each player’s experience is entirely their own.

Features

  • Intense grid-based combat built into an adaptive and immersive story.
  • Intelligent characters - friend and foe alike. Will they fight to the bitter end? Or flee as their friends fall around them?
  • Seamless gameplay - Go from speaking to slaughtering without breaks in the gameplay. You’ll never expect what happens next.
  • Unique and atmospheric blend of 2D and 3D graphics.
  • Variable music that matches to your gameplay. Feel the dead quiet of the ruins and the rush of mortal danger.

data.short_description: You are the Sword Pilgrim. You must find the Swordmaster. Will you take the Trial Sword and dedicate yourself to bloodshed? Or will you carve your own path across the towers? Become the Swordmaster you were meant to be in this combat-focused sword-fighting RPG.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains depictions of combative violence and mature themes not suitable for all ages.
